channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.2
item.description:
This update includes the following version of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 11.14 with PostGIS 2.5.5

To save bandwidth, this automatic update only includes a bugfix updates for PostgreSQL 11. You can download newer versions from our website: postgresapp.com/downloads.html
